item.title: Ticket #221 (Filtering categories does not work for monthly archives) created
item.dc:creator: Brak
item.description: When viewing montly categories (?m=200408) and using category filters up top ($cat = "1,7,9,10";) It requires a space ($cat = "1, 7, 9, 10";), while all other pages (main view, etc) do not.

item.title: Ticket #220 (GB Pound sign problems) created
item.dc:creator: anonymousbugger
item.description: Upgrading from 1.0.1 to 1.2 caused issues with the GB pound sign - £; i was left with a strange question mark symbol. This isn't the first time i've had issues with the £ and wordpress. Might be worth investigating.

item.title: Changeset [1535]: Document %category% and %author% in the permalink options.
item.dc:creator: rboren
item.description: Document %category% and %author% in the permalink options.

item.title: Changeset [1534]: Complete support for %author% in post permalinks.
item.dc:creator: rboren
item.description: Complete support for %author% in post permalinks.

item.title: Changeset [1533]: Use sanitize_title() to process post, page, author, and category names ...
item.dc:creator: rboren
item.description: Use sanitize_title() to process post, page, author, and category names in the query.
